name: A Trip to the Aerospace Museum Unofficially Brought to You by Lockheed Martin
name_original: A Trip to the Aerospace Museum Unofficially Brought to You by Lockheed Martin
description:
Aviation is beautiful but inexorably linked to human suffering. The presentation of aircraft should treat them as such. But that's hard when your largest donors are arms manufacturers and your institution is beholden to right-wing, pro-American interest groups and politicians...

(Developed in one week for Carleton College's CAMS 257: Video Games and Identity course)
